blogs.title: Seferihisar trip
blogs.author: Seden
blogs.desc: The water was so clean that...
blogs.body: The water was so clear that it helped me to relax just by looking at it. I run towards the sea. While soft sand was under my feet, the sea was embracing me. The water was warm and clean. I always liked warm seas more than cold ones. This way I can stay inside it as much as I want. I love swimming.

blogs.title: Sea trip
blogs.author: Seden
blogs.body: The best sea is always the clean one.
